description: Configuration for the types of items available to the player.

propertyNames.description: Type names must be a sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

color.description: Color can be defined in the form `rrr ggg bbb`, `rrr ggg bbb aaa`, `hsb hhh sss bbb` or `hsb hhh sss bbb aaa`

pickUpSound.description: The gestalt id of the sound asset played when an item of this type is picked up.

sz.description: The scale factor of this type's item icon.
